title: Tech News: LG Hanging Up On the Phone Business?
itunes:title: Tech News: LG Hanging Up On the Phone Business?
description:
LG might stop making smartphones. The SolarWinds hack continues to be really bad. Soon you'll be able to buy makeup inspired by Animal Crossing. And much more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
